label.desc: Text label that will “float” up above the input field, once the field gets focus

options.desc: Available options that the user can select from

clearable.desc: Appends clearable icon when a value (not undefined or null) is set; When clicked, model becomes null

value.desc: Model of the component; Must be Array

optionValue.desc: Property of option which holds the 'value'; If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline

use-chips.desc: Use QChip to show what is currently selected
